title: We need Star Guardian Syndra..
body: Riot it is totally unfair to give skins to the champions that already have at least 4 - 5 skins. Tho Jinx deserved the skin but why didn't you make SG Syndra?? Also give Graves his cigar back .__.

replies.body:
Down vote Purely for the Graves cigar part. Graves vapes from his gun now. 

Also, if anyone brings up gragas: that is a skin, not his base look. i would love to see a Graves skin with a cigar, but due to legal reasons, his base skin cannot, and will not have it.

Syndra is totally forgotten :(
The star guardian theme fits her well!
I wish she could have the star guardian skin.. :))
